user_instruction: 'Send an update to Maria (maria@email.com) about the latest developments. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest Developments

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a chance, could you please send me an update on the latest developments (case statuses, upcoming workshop/clinic dates, etc.)? If it helps, you can pull the relevant details from your Gmail and Notion to ensure everything is current and complete.

Please send the update to my email at maria@email.com so I can promptly distribute the information to our community members.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,
Maria

final_output:
